bootcamps.title: ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance)
bootcamps.description: The ESG Bootcamp is an intensive program designed to equip participants with in-demand sustainability skills through 15 live classes led by ESG experts, interactive real-world case studies, and a job accelerator program. Participants will gain practical insights into Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) principles, sharpen their problem-solving abilities by working on industry-relevant challenges, and receive tailored career support including CV building, interview preparation, and access to ESG-related job and internship opportunitiesâ€”making it ideal for students, young professionals, or career switchers looking to thrive in the sustainability sector.

faqs.question: Apakah bootcamp ini cocok untuk pemula?
faqs.answer: Ya, meskipun level intermediate, kami menyediakan materi foundational di awal program. Yang penting adalah komitmen untuk belajar dan basic understanding tentang business.

faqs.question: Bagaimana format live class-nya?
faqs.answer: Live class dilakukan 2x seminggu via Zoom, masing-masing 2 jam. Semua session akan direkam dan bisa diakses kapan saja.

faqs.question: Apakah ada job placement guarantee?
faqs.answer: Kami memiliki job accelerator program dengan hiring partners, namun tidak ada guarantee. Yang kami jamin adalah career coaching dan networking opportunities.

faqs.question: Apakah mendapat sertifikat?
faqs.answer: Ya, peserta yang menyelesaikan program akan mendapat sertifikat completion dari Rise Social yang diakui industri.
